Mayor's Office
--------------

Mayor Rosen, South County Fire, and Maplewood students and staff.

![Maplewood Pedestrian Education](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_16494932/Banner/567714/111ae822-ee93-42d3-ba7d-4ae0b92835e8.jpeg "Maplewood Pedestrian Education")

Maplewood Pedestrian Education

Mayor Rosen, South County Fire, and Maplewood students and staff.

Mayor Mike Rosen
----------------

Mayor Mike Rosen was elected Mayor in November 2023. He officially took office on January 1, 2024. His term expires on December 31, 2027.

### 2026 Budget Address

Edmonds Mayor Mike Rosen's 2026 Budget Address was presented September 30th, 2025 at the Edmonds Waterfront Center.

[Mid Biennial Budget Presentation](https://youtu.be/oFS90cEG-D4 "video")

[Proposed Modified Budget Strategic Overview](https://www.edmondswa.gov/UserFiles/Servers/Server_16494932/File/Government/Departments/Mayor's%20Office/Mayor's%20Budget%20Address/Proposed%20Modified%20Budget%20Summary%20Revised%2010-8-2025.pdf "budget")
